description:
Course fully up-to-date and new lectures added as of this month.

JOIN 1,000s OF FACEBOOK USERS WHO ARE NOW GROWING, MANAGING, AND GENERATING PROFITS FROM THEIR OWN FACEBOOK GROUPS!

1. Would you like to discover seven (7) ways to leverage Facebook for your business, personal brand, and sales goals?

2. Are you tired of the same old Twitter and LinkedIn marketing courses/books that lead nowhere?

3. Are you interested in increasing your leads and subscribers while expanding your online influence?

If you answered "yes" to at least one of these questions, then this course is for you!

If you're in business without a Facebook group, you're not using Facebook correctly! Facebook is the #1 social media platform, #2 most visited website, and an online platform with over 1 billion active users. At just over ten years old, Facebook offers tremendous brand building, marketing, and sales opportunities. Best of all, the influential capabilities of Facebook groups and pages won't cost you a cent, they're investment free.

Facebook Group Profits is the first comprehensive online course dedicated to mastering Facebook groups. We'll tackle how to create, grow, manage, and monetize a group from start to finish. This course is designed to ignite your social media and online marketing reach and success.

As you navigate this course, you'll gain insights and learn the strategies I use to monetize my Facebook groups of over 12,000 members. Upon successful completion of this course, you'll be able to:

  • Understand Facebook, its ecosystem, and marketing potential for business purposes
  • Create, grow, manage, and monetize a successful Facebook group
  • Leverage a Facebook group for revenue and profit objectives
  • Increase your subscribers and contacts while expanding your network
  • Address various important considerations during the maturation phase of a group
  • And much more...


Sign up and experience the most comprehensive Facebook group course found on the web.

Start Learning!

Enroll now and start monetizing your group TODAY!
title: Facebook for Business: Facebook Group Profits
instructors: Chad Tennant, Make Money Online - Home Business
